mapping.title: omschrijving
mapping.category: {% if zaaktypecode|default %}{% set wooVerzoekenEnBesluiten = ['LP00000431', 'B1873'] %}{% set klachtoordelen = ['LP00000091', 'LP00001132', 'LP00000121', 'B0757', 'LP00000832', 'LP00001096'] %}{% if zaaktypecode in wooVerzoekenEnBesluiten %}{{ 'Woo-verzoeken en -besluiten' }}{% elseif zaaktypecode in klachtoordelen %}{{ 'Klachtoordelen' }}{% endif %}{% endif %}
mapping.attachments: [{% if files is defined and files is not empty %}{% set count = 0 %}{% for file in files %}{% if file['titel']|default and file['inhoud']|default %}{% if count > 0 %}, {% endif %}{"filename": "{{ file['bestandsnaam'] }}", "label": "{{ 'woo_informatieverzoek' }}", "content": "{{ file.inhoud }}"}{% set count = count + 1 %}{% endif %} {% endfor %}{% endif %}]
